snippet.title: EXIT - The Trial of the Griffin game trailer
snippet.description:
Play the award-winning game series "EXIT- The Game" digitally, now!

Go back to the year 1837 to the legendary Greifenstein Castle, solve multi-layered, creative puzzles, and free the Countess - and yourself.
The exciting escape room game "EXIT - The Trial of the Griffin" will be available on the App Store, on Google Play, and on Steam from March 22, 2023.

More information on https://exitgame.app
